newsitem.title: JAPAN: Square ask-only on dimmer forecast.
newsitem.headline: Square ask-only on dimmer forecast.

text.p: Shares in software manufacturer Square Co Ltd were ask-only on Monday morning after its announcement of a downward revision in its earnings forecast for the current business year late on Friday, traders said.
At 0046 GMT, the share was quoted ask-only at 5,860 yen on the over-the-counter (OTC) market. Its Friday"s close was 6,060 yen.
Square said on Friday that it expects a parent current profit for the business year to March 31 of 1.5 billion yen, lower than its previous forecast of 9.1 billion yen.
Its parent current profit last financial year was 8.07 billion yen.
